data.text:
I waited for Seiun Sky 
prior to the start of training, but…
data.processed:
󠁿I waited for Seiun Sky 
󠁿prior to the start of training, but…

data.text: Since there was a huge racing event coming to Tracen Academy soon, the racetrack was filled with Uma Musume wanting to train.
data.processed: 󠁿Since there was a huge racing event coming to Tracen Academy soon, the racetrack was filled with Uma Musume wanting to train.

data.text:
With how crowded it is she's probably thinking 
"if I can't give it my all, what's the point?" 
And because of that she'll probably ditch
data.processed:
󠁿With how crowded it is she's probably thinking 
󠁿"if I can't give it my all, what's the point?" 
󠁿And because of that she'll probably ditch

data.text: Trainer-san, hello!!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer-san, hello!!

data.text:
Today's a great day for training, doncha think!? 
I'm really itching to race right now!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Today's a great day for training, doncha think!? 
󠁿I'm really itching to race right now!

data.text:
Woah, that's how you react when the Uma Musume 
you're training arrives? How depressing. I 
thought you'd be glad to see me.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Woah, that's how you react when the Uma Musume 
󠁿you're training arrives? How depressing. I 
󠁿thought you'd be glad to see me.

data.text:
No no, my next race is coming up soon, 
so I wouldn't dream of skipping out on training.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿No no, my next race is coming up soon, 
󠁿so I wouldn't dream of skipping out on training.

data.text:
Plus I'm feeling great today! 
I can't just sit around, I just wanna run!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Plus I'm feeling great today! 
󠁿I can't just sit around, I just wanna run!

data.text:
So I'm gonna do just that! 
Oh, by the way…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿So I'm gonna do just that! 
󠁿Oh, by the way…

data.text:
Trainer-san, you'll be keeping a close eye on 
me, won't you? I'm looking forward to being 
rewarded for all of my hard work after this…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-san, you'll be keeping a close eye on 
󠁿me, won't you? I'm looking forward to being 
󠁿rewarded for all of my hard work after this…

data.text:
Just like she said, Seiun Sky ran with 
great form in an aggressive manner. Then…
data.processed:
󠁿Just like she said, Seiun Sky ran with 
󠁿great form in an aggressive manner. Then…

data.text: Hey hey, got a minute?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Hey hey, got a minute?

data.text: The course is packed today, and there's not much room to run, so would you mind if I ran alongside you?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿The course is packed today, and there's not much room to run, so would you mind if I ran alongside you?

data.text:
Yes, that's fine. Securing a spot 
on the track today's really tough, huh?
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
󠁿Yes, that's fine. Securing a spot 
󠁿on the track today's really tough, huh?

data.text: Hmm, who should I train with next… Oh!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Hmm, who should I train with next… Oh!

data.text:
Excuse me. Until a separate spot opens up, 
would you mind if I ran with you?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Excuse me. Until a separate spot opens up, 
󠁿would you mind if I ran with you?

data.text:
Guess that's fine. 
Let's go for a run then.
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
󠁿Guess that's fine. 
󠁿Let's go for a run then.

data.text:
It's rare for Seiun Sky to show off her 
abilities, so seeing her call out and train with 
others was stunning.
data.processed:
󠁿It's rare for Seiun Sky to show off her 
󠁿abilities, so seeing her call out and train with 
󠁿others was stunning.

data.text:
Looking closely, all the girls she raced with 
were favored to win in the upcoming race.
data.processed:
󠁿Looking closely, all the girls she raced with 
󠁿were favored to win in the upcoming race.

data.text: Then that means… she's doing this to gather information on her rivals? If so…

choices.text: I know what I have to do!
I know what I have to do!

data.processed: 󠁿Then that means… she's doing this to gather information on her rivals? If so…

data.text:
Since Seiun Sky's been putting in so much 
effort, I should give it my all as well.
data.processed:
󠁿Since Seiun Sky's been putting in so much 
󠁿effort, I should give it my all as well.

data.text:
Haa… How was today's training? Don't you think I 
did a great job despite how crowded it was?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Haa… How was today's training? Don't you think I 
󠁿did a great job despite how crowded it was?

data.text:
Don't you think I deserve a 
reward for my hard work today?
data.name: Seiun Sky

choices.text: You did amazing, here's your reward.
You did amazing, here's your reward.

data.processed:
󠁿Don't you think I deserve a 
󠁿reward for my hard work today?

data.text: Oh, what's this data? Hmm…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Oh, what's this data? Hmm…

data.text:
The first girl that I raced against has a habit of 
getting overzealous and pushing too hard to get ahead…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿The first girl that I raced against has a habit of 
󠁿getting overzealous and pushing too hard to get ahead…

data.text:
The second girl I raced against seemed to 
struggle when she was directly behind me…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿The second girl I raced against seemed to 
󠁿struggle when she was directly behind me…

data.text:
Oh… I get it now. You were preparing 
this "reward" for me while I was training.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Oh… I get it now. You were preparing 
󠁿this "reward" for me while I was training.

data.text:
Yup, this is perfect. 
I knew it, you know me so well.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Yup, this is perfect. 
󠁿I knew it, you know me so well.

data.text: Thanks to this wonderful "reward", Sei-chan's bond level has increased by one. Pirorirori～n♪
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Thanks to this wonderful "reward", Sei-chan's bond level has increased by one. Pirorirori～n♪

data.text:
If things stay like this, we might just catch 
something big in the upcoming race… Just kidding.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿If things stay like this, we might just catch 
󠁿something big in the upcoming race… Just kidding.

data.text:
She seems happy with the data I gave her. After 
all, she looked back at it multiple times.
data.processed:
󠁿She seems happy with the data I gave her. After 
󠁿all, she looked back at it multiple times.
